dcterms:description: The dataset comprises CT and MRI-T1 scans of 42 H&N patients and contours for 30 OARs provided for the CT scans. This dataset was used to train the developed segmentation pipeline.
dcterms:title: H&N OAR CT & MR segmentation challenge dataset
